content: amigurumi alien abbreviations materials used mc magic_ring worsted weight yarn in green and black single_crochet single_crochet size 4 hook increase increase decrease decrease first leg second leg r1 6sc into a mc 6 r1 6sc into a mc 6 r2-5 single_crochet in each stitch 6 r2-5 single_crochet in each stitch 6 fasten_off and start second leg join to 1st leg with a single_crochet working legs together now r6 single_crochet around both legs 12 be careful to make the stitch count come out correctly r7-9 single_crochet in each stitch 12 begin stuffing and stuff as you go r10 4sc decrease x2 10 r11 3sc decrease x2 8 r12 2sc decrease x2 6 r13 increase x6 12 r14 5sc increase x2 14 r15 6sc increase x2 16 r16 3sc increase x4 20 r17 4sc increase x4 24 r18 5sc increase x4 28 r19-21 single_crochet in each stitch 28 r22 5sc decrease x4 24 r23 4sc decrease x4 20 r24 single_crochet decrease x6 decrease 13 r25 decrease x6 single_crochet 7 finish stuffing and finish off hide yarn tail arms make two r1 6sc into a mc 6 r2-3 single_crochet in each stitch 6 r4 4sc decrease 5 r5 5 single_crochet 5 finish off leaving a long tail sew to the body between row 10-11 eyes make two use size 3mm hook chain 6 4sc starting in second chain from the hook increase in last chain 3sc working back up the other side of chain slip_stitch and finish off leaving a long tail for sewing i recommend using pins to secure eyes before sewing them to the head my eyes are placed at a slight angle between row 17-21 but i just sort of eyeball it my daughter added a length of yarn to her little alien so that she could hang him from her rearview mirror i hope you enjoy this pattern i would love to see your finished projects so tag me if you make something @yarns_n_nobles
